scene.name: Knot tying setup
scene.description: A flexible cotton rope or shoelace placed horizontally on a flat table surface

task.name: Tie a basic overhand knot
task.description: Manipulate a single rope to form a standard overhand knot at its center
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We are going to tie a simple knot. Please pick up the ends of the rope and tie a basic overhand knot in the middle.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要打一个简单的结。请拿起绳子的两端，在中间部位打一个基础的单结。

subtasks.description: Execute the loop and pull sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Follow the steps to form the loop and secure the knot.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：按照步骤形成绳圈并紧固绳结。

steps.description: Form a loop with the rope
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: cross one end of the rope over the other to create a loop.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：将绳子的一端交叉叠在另一端之上，形成一个绳圈。

steps.description: Thread the end through the loop
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: tuck the end of the rope through the loop you just created.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：将绳子的一头穿过刚才形成的绳圈。

steps.spoken_prompt: Step three: pull both ends of the rope in opposite directions to tighten the knot.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第三步：向相反方向拉动绳子两端，将结收紧。

constraints.notes: The knot should be centered on the rope; ensure the tension is firm but not excessive.
